text: George Cecil Augustus Smith (1877–1964) was Archdeacon of Madras from 1926 to 1929.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1938 p1232: London, OUP, 19129 Smith was educated at Durham University and ordained in 1902. After curacies in Armley and Hellesdon he went with the Eccles Establishment to India. He served at Ootacamund, Trichinopoly, Bellary, George Town, Chennai and Bangalore. Returning from India in 1931, he held incumbencies at Kingston,Vicars of Kingston Courteenhall and South Newton. ==References== Category:20th-century Anglican priests Category:Alumni of University College, Durham Category:Archdeacons of Madras Category:1877 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Eccles Establishment people
title: George Smith (priest)
